titleStmt.title: The cities welcome to Colonell Rich and Colonell Baxter, with their solemne invitation to the sainted commanders in the army, to come and quarter amongst them.

notesStmt.note: Satiric verse - "If we may, dare to say,".
Annotation on Thomason copy: Jan: 27."; '48' in imprint date crossed through and "7" written alongside; "1647".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
